roleset.name: surpass, go past

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The economic malaise which has spread through Taiwan in just the last two years is rapidly overtaking tens of thousands of middle - aged workers .
example.arg: The economic malaise which has spread through Taiwan in just the last two years
tens of thousands of middle - aged workers

roleset.note: OVERTAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overtake' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from overtake.01-v predicate notes)
